name: Most frustrating ant game
description:
Feed that ant!

This little ant is your best friend. And it's hungry. Get some ant food and drop it.
You can drop one food. And wait.
It is not the smartest ant and needs a bit more time to reach its food.
Once it has eaten, drop more food.

It is a game about patients and frustration. The joy of nihilism.

There should be a few errors. Edge cases are not tested.

Everything is made from scratch. No libraries are used.
